attributes.action: Make it legally known that criticism of Islam, or any religion is not racist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people who have spoken out about Islam have been branded racist by both the courts and the press.

Constructive criticism of a religion cannot, in a free-country, be banned anyway - but that is a different issue.

The government should make it clear that criticism of a religion - including Islam is not racist.  Islam is a religion; it is not a race.  Therefore people who speak out about it and its effects on British life are not racist.

The government should make it illegal for a person to be labelled a racist, or prosecuted as a racist for simply criticising a religion.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
